properties.name: spring.datasource.jdbcUrl
properties.description: JDBC URL of the main database.

properties.name: manon.default-user.actuator.username
properties.description: Default actuator-user name. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.actuator.password
properties.description: Default actuator-user password. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.admin.username
properties.description: Default admin-user name. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.admin.password
properties.description: Default admin-user password. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.dev.username
properties.description: Default development-user name. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.dev.password
properties.description: Default development-user password. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.security.bcrypt.strength
properties.description: Password bcrypt strength.

properties.name: manon.batch.user-snapshot.chunk
properties.description: User snapshot batch: user chunk size.

properties.name: manon.batch.user-snapshot.snapshot.max-age
properties.description: User snapshot batch: user snapshot max age.

properties.name: manon.batch.flyway.enabled
properties.description: Spring Batch datasource: use Flyway for database migration.

properties.name: manon.batch.datasource.driver-class-name
properties.description: Spring Batch datasource: fully qualified name of the JDBC driver..

properties.name: manon.batch.datasource.jdbcUrl
properties.description: Spring Batch datasource: JDBC URL.

properties.name: manon.batch.flyway.baseline-on-migrate
properties.description: Spring Batch datasource: whether to automatically call baseline when migrating a non-empty schema.

properties.name: manon.batch.flyway.location
properties.description: Spring Batch datasource: location of Flyway migration script.

properties.name: manon.batch.datasource.username
properties.description: Spring Batch datasource: username.

properties.name: manon.batch.datasource.password
properties.description: Spring Batch datasource: password.

properties.name: manon.performance-recorder.enabled
properties.description: Enable API performance recorder. Should be used in development or test environment only.

properties.name: info.app.name
properties.description: Application name.

properties.name: info.app.version
properties.description: Application version, taken from pom.xml.

properties.name: manon.security.jwt.signing-key-b64
properties.description: JWT signing key (Base64 encoded).

properties.name: manon.security.jwt.token-ttl
properties.description: JWT token time to live.

properties.name: manon.security.jwt.issuer
properties.description: JWT issuer.

properties.name: manon.cache.provider
properties.description: Cache provider. Set to redis or embedded.

properties.name: manon.cache.redis.ttl
properties.description: Redis cache entries default ttl.

properties.name: manon.httpclient.connect-timeout
properties.description: Http client connection timeout.

properties.name: manon.httpclient.read-timeout
properties.description: Http client read timeout.

properties.name: manon.batch.notification-email-to
properties.description: Send a notification to this email every time a batch is executed.

properties.name: manon.web.request-logging.enabled
properties.description: Enable logging of web requests. When enabled, the logging level of CommonsRequestLoggingFilter should be set to DEBUG. Should be used in development or test environment only.

values.description: Redis cache type. Requires a running Redis server.
Embedded cache type. Backed by a in-memory concurrent hash map.
